participant_1.background:
I am a healthy person who enjoys the occasional Budweiser beer in moderation.
my dog s name is wonwon.
I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage.
i like candy and soda.
I plan to go for a ride on my scooter in the mountains.

participant_2.background:
I love running with my family and friends because we always have a good time together.
I like to collect little raincoat-wearing toys, especially the Disney ones.
I'm still learning the ropes at my new job, but I'm enjoying it so far!
my favorite band is radiohead.
my mother is a dentist.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing well. Just started my new job this week!
Congrats! How do you like it so far?
It's going great! Learning the ropes is the hardest part but I'm getting the hang of it.
That's good to hear! What do you do for work?
I'm a marketing coordinator at a small tech company. It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding!
That sounds really interesting! I've always been interested in marketing.
If you're looking for a career in marketing, I highly recommend it! It's a great field to be in.
Thanks for the advice! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! So, what are your hobbies?
I love to read, cook, and spend time with my dog, WonWon.
That sounds like a great way to spend your free time! I love to read too. I also like running and collecting little raincoat-wearing toys.
Oh, that's cool! I've never heard of collecting little raincoat-wearing toys before.
It's a pretty niche hobby, but I love it! I have a whole collection of them, mostly Disney characters.
That's so cool! I'd love to see your collection sometime.
I'd be happy to show you! We should get together sometime soon.
Sounds great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Awesome! I look forward to it
